features: 【Slim and Ergonomic Design】 The slim keyboard has a tilt angle for the great typing position.Sweat-resistant, skin-friendly finish wireless mouse in contoured shape would provide hours of work comfortably.
【Fast Operation 2.4G Wireless Plug and Play】 Simply connect both your portable keyboard and mouse with one USB receiver
【Less Noise&Profile Keys Typing】 The keyboard's noise reduced keys and the silent click of the quiet mice will allow you to do your job without missing a sound or disturbing your environment.
【Compatible Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo】 The keyboard and mouse combo includes a full-size keyboard and a high sensitivity mouse.
【HIGH PRECITION】 Wireless Mouse DPI 1600 in 3 levels- You can easily change the cursor sensitivity of this cordless mouse depending on your activities;usually 800 DPI for office
body.description: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo, LeadsaiL Compact Quiet Full Size Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Set,Wireless Mouse DPI 1600 in 3 levels- You can easily change the cursor sensitivity of this cordless mouse depending on your activities;usually 800 DPI for office, DPI 1200-1600 for 4K resolution monitor or entertainment like gaming at home. 2 polling rate: 125Hz and 250Hz; adjusted by pressing the right key and the wheel simultaneously at 3s for change.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.8 3.8 out of 5 stars 760 ratings 3.8 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as discribed
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my home server, and raspberry pi's, etc... For once in a while use or projects it's perfect.I've seen reviews of people complaining about this item. and the thing is its $15 for 2.4Ghz wireless keyb. and mouse. It's not going to be a Razer, or Corsair, or even Logitech compatible. Let's get real.Works perfect for the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good product for the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and easy to read.
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something small and compact and easy to read, this unit filled the bill and I recommend it for someone looking for a compact setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defective product, defective vendor
reviews.reviewText: This product failed within 90 days of purchase, and I requested a warranty replacement from the manufacturer, which the manufacturer agreed to. I never received the replacement. The mouse wheel shaft broke and does not work, a first since I began using mice when they came out in the last millenium. Several of the keyboard keys stick habitually, making use of this cheap defective product impossible. I strongly recommend you do not consider this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars good little set but...
reviews.reviewText: There is something really wrong with the keyboard. The keys are not easy to push... maybe Im too used to the MacBook super smooth keyboard. Maybe it's the size... it is a VERY compact keyboard (which is actually why I bought it) but maybe it is TOO small? Maybe my fingers just don't have the power they used to have.... I don't know. I just know that when I'm typing, I have missed entire words because the keys didn't depress all the way.The mouse is great. No complaints there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars not only looks great but feels great too
reviews.reviewText: My old Logitech keyboard has sticky problem with 2 keys and it got so annoying that I decided to replace it with a new keyboard. I decided to get a keyboard and mouse combo with USB receiver because 1) I would just need 1 USB receiver to connect both devices, saving USB port, and 2) USB receiver is much more responsive without any lag compared to Bluetooth keyboards and mice.I got this combo keyboard and mouse because of its inexpensive price and its sharp and clean look but I was surprised with the quality and feel of the keys on the keyboard. They are very quiet yet very responsive, thanks to scissors switch key design. They are low profile and looks very slick. I also like that it's a full size keyboard with number pad. The USB receiver can be found inside the battery compartment of the keyboard, which is clearly labeled outside. Keyboard needs 2 AA batteries and while mouse need 1 AA battery. You really can't go wrong with this combo set if you are in the market for new keyboard and mouse. 5 out of 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not for me - You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: This product is just okay. I like the size -- it is compact which works for my smaller hands. It looks sleek at first glance, and the mouse has the shape of apple products, which I like. The cons: the items are so cheaply made, they look like they could come from a dollar store, like a throw-away kid's toy. Also, while the keyboard itself is light and sleek, the buttons are super big, clunky and heavy. They seem to stick as they are pressed, and I feel like a child learning to type for the first time. It is so hard to use and I am making so many mistakes. I wanted to love it, but it is slowing my productivity time tremendously. I would only recommend buying if it's not a daily, all day use thing. I'm sure it packs well and might be a good backup product, but not for daily work use, in my opinion. Will be returning for something sturdier and easier to type on. You get what you pay for with this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY COMPACT AND EASY TO USE
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. The keyboard is sleek and compact, making it easy to carry around and use on the go. The keys are responsive and have a satisfying click to them, making typing a breeze. The mouse is also comfortable to hold and glides smoothly across surfaces. The wireless connection is strong and I haven't experienced any lag or connectivity issues. Overall, this combo has greatly improved my productivity and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable and efficient keyboard and mouse setup.
